meta.description: Maximize the gross domestic product of Carelland by optimizing the production of steel, engines, electronics, and plastics.

params.name: unit_price
params.description: Unit prices of commodities on the world market in Klunz.

params.name: production_requirements
params.description: Units of other commodities required to produce one unit of each commodity.

params.name: import_cost
params.description: Cost of other imported goods required to produce one unit of each commodity in Klunz.

params.name: labor_requirements
params.description: Person-months of work required to produce one unit of each commodity.

params.name: total_labor
params.description: Total available labor force per year in person-months.

vars.name: production
vars.description: Units of each commodity to produce.

objective.name: max_gdp
objective.expr: sum(production[c] * (unit_price[c] - import_cost[c]) for c in COMMODITIES)
objective.description: Maximize the gross domestic product by optimizing the production of commodities.

constraints.name: labor_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(production[c] * labor_requirements[c] for c in COMMODITIES)
constraints.description: Total labor used must not exceed available labor.

constraints.name: engines_production_limit
constraints.description: Production of engines must not exceed its limit.

constraints.name: plastics_production_limit
constraints.description: Production of plastics must not exceed its limit.
